article_title: Bridgestone Raises Bid for Pep Boys to Match $863 Million Icahn Offer
article_text:
Bridgestone Corp. on Friday raised its bid for Pep Boys-Manny Moe & Jack to match Icahn Enterprises LP’s $863 million offer.

Pep Boys, which had given Bridgestone...
